blog.name: mha-noir
blog.title: Writings beneath a pale moon
blog.description: Hi, I'm Moon, and welcome to my MHA writing blog! Here you can find my writing, my vigilante ocs and ask me about them or about quirks (theories, concept help, analysis, etc.)

summary: Henlo your gang orca is 100 emoji, it is 6am heyho I hope you don't mind another for him - F, P and U?? Or you can ignore this...
question: Henlo your gang orca is 100 emoji, it is 6am heyho I hope you don't mind another for him - F, P and U?? Or you can ignore this that's cool  too LOL thanks!!
answer:
F ight - Would they be easy to forgive their s/o? How are they fighting?

They would probably get into arguments when Gang Orca is feeling particularly strained and tense, between his work and how people look at him. He would likely be more snappish in this state, getting angry about the smallest of things, which is how their fights would end up occurring. After getting his accumulated stress and aggression, he would apologize and elect to sleep on the couch, perhaps not trusting himself to be near someone he cares so much about.

P DA - Are they upfront about their relationship? Do they brag with their s/o in front of others? Or are they rather shy to kiss etc. when others are watching?

It isn’t that he doesn’t want people to know about his relationship (although he has had times where he’s worried about his s/o’s safety in regards to his work), it’s more that he doesn’t see the point. If he wants to give his s/o affection, then he would do it somewhere more personal than in public, since the entirety of public places constitute as his work place.

U nderstanding - How good do they know their partner? Are they empathetic?

You don’t come to be one of the best heroes in Japan by being oblivious to the little details. He would quickly learn his s/o’s little tells so that he could better care for them. From getting them their favorite snack when they’re trying to hide that they’re hungry, to trying to comfort them when they’re having a bad day.

tags: can yall tell i really love twice
also before anyone gets angry over it: i dont support a lot of their morals / goals etc.
but as characters i like them
title: BNHA Chapter 231 - Spoilers
body:
[Please blacklist #bnha manga spoilers if you do not want to see this content, or press J on desktop to skip this post altogether.]

Okay this chapter really made me feel a whole lot. I know the League of Villains is made up of villains, but I adore the way they talk to each other and interact and the level of care they all show for each other?

And at first we really saw that in previous updates with Twice. I think Twice has been portrayed as being one of the most caring members of the league, with Toga and Giran primarily (who also show care in return).

Now for the screenshots.

Spinner checking on Shigaraki, and Shigaraki asking if he’s okay in return.

Twice / one of his clones diving in to protect Shigaraki and get him out of harms way.

Twice’s excitement to see Spinner and Shigaraki????? And Shigaraki asking about Twice multiplying himself, probably knowing about the trauma behind it.

Shigaraki telling Twice he’s incredible for it. Complimenting and supporting each other. Their teamwork is amazing and I love it, I feel like they’re starting to really come together as a group.

Twice knowing Shigaraki needs rest and offering to let him sleep.

Twice rushing to help Giran, and also is that a vine reference?

Shigaraki knowing how much Giran means to Twice and getting mad at the Liberation Army over it.

“Our home”. They’re a family, convince me otherwise.

But yeah honestly? I really enjoy the characters in the LOV. The support in the last few episodes, Twice combating his trauma and doing everything in his power to support the others, their support for Magne and the way they correct others on her pronouns, and just a lot of the stuff they do? Love it.
